effect.scarlet-violet: Inflicts regular damage. If the target takes damage this turn for any reason before this move is used, this move has double power.
effect.the-teal-mask: Inflicts regular damage. If the target takes damage this turn for any reason before this move is used, this move has double power.
effect.the-indigo-disk: Inflicts regular damage. If the target takes damage this turn for any reason before this move is used, this move has double power.

short_effect.scarlet-violet: Power is doubled if the target has already received damage this turn.
short_effect.the-teal-mask: Power is doubled if the target has already received damage this turn.
short_effect.the-indigo-disk: Power is doubled if the target has already received damage this turn.

flavor_text.scarlet-violet: This move's power is doubled if the target has already taken some damage in the same turn.
